credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Three Views of a Wedding Canopy, Beth Am Synagogue, Los Altos, California
medium: White crayon over graphite on brown paper (partially overlaid with second piece of paper), mounted on cardboard
description: Three views of wedding canopy:  at left, canopy laid flat; upper right, canopy viewed frontally; lower right:  canopy suspended on four poles with couple sketched beneath.  Canopy has white flowers scattered over one/half, with long flat fringes forming part of canopy hanging over the front edge.
name: Drawing
